text: 16|110|(napiyē!) Evarkaḷ (etirikaḷāl) tuṉpuṟuttappaṭṭu, piṉṉar (taṅkaḷ illattiliruntu) veḷippaṭṭu, pōrum purintu (pala ciramaṅkaḷaiyum) cakittuk koṇṭu uṟutiyāka iruntārkaḷō avarkaḷuk(ku aruḷ purivataṟ)kākavē niccayamāka umatu iṟaivaṉ irukkiṟāṉ. Niccayamāka umatu iṟaivaṉ itaṟkup piṉṉarum (avarkaḷai) maṉṉippavaṉ (avarkaḷ mītu) karuṇaiyuṭaiyavaṉ āvāṉ
